biotools.summary:
Semi-implicit relaxed Douglas-Rachford algorithm (sDR) for ptychography.

Free Matlab Source Codes for the semi-implicit relaxed Douglas-Rachford (sDR) Algorithm.

Free Matlab Source Codes for the semi implicit relaxed Douglas-Rachford (sDR).

This page describes an iterative Ptychography reconstruction algorithm, termed semi-implicit relaxed Douglas-Rachford (sDR), which has been developed to improve the robustness and the convergence of sequential extended Ptychographic iteartive engine (ePIE)
